nodes.text: Siege Skytrooper was a skytrooper variant used by the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. Several times larger than a regular Human-sized skytrooper, the Siege Skytrooper was powerful enough to go face-to-face with a walker. During the Assault on Odessen in 3630 BBY one Siege Skytrooper was encounted by the Alliance Commander.
Siege Skytrooper appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne "Chapter 8: End Times".
